message: When I come to, Mink is looking down at me. He seems a little out of breath.
My body feels heavy, like I just climaxed, though I don't recall the event itself.

And to top it off... my head is killing me.
I have to take my meds...
Mink narrows his eyes at me. I can sense some emotion flickering in their depths.
But what it is... I can't tell.
Mink pulls out of me and stands.
I try to get up too... but I can't.
I can't move a muscle. I can barely even think.
Mink's just going to leave me here anyway. So what's it matter... I'll just lie here... and rest a while...
...And so, I sink once more into darkness.
